text: The following people served as Members of the Greater London Council, either as councillors or Aldermen. The polling days were: * 9 April 1964 (Aldermen elected on 27 April) * 13 April 1967 (Aldermen elected on 2 May) * 9 April 1970 (Aldermen elected on 28 April) * 12 April 1973 (Aldermen elected on 4 May) * 5 May 1977 * 7 May 1981 ==A== * Frank Lewis Abbott (C): Wandsworth 1967–1970;
